definition: slender waist/fig. pretty woman/mortise and tenon joint on a coffin
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: Father and son 2 people worry search HanShan and willow thin waists.
sentences.chinese: 父子二人着急地尋覓韓珊和柳細腰。

sentences.english: This type always makes me think of the curvy mid-18 th century woman with their corsets and cleavage.
sentences.chinese: 這種風格會讓我想到18世紀那些豐乳細腰的女人。

sentences.english: Body -Short-coupled and sturdy with no waist or tuck-up.
sentences.chinese: 身軀短而結實，沒有細腰或收腹。

sentences.english: Men have a natural preference for women with youthfully narrow waists and full hips.
sentences.chinese: 男人很自然會偏好有青春細腰與豐臀的女人。

sentences.english: He said in an ideal world, the more fat around the thighs the better--as long as the tummy stays slim."Unfortunately
sentences.chinese: 他表示，理想情況下，保持細腰，大腿越粗越好。

sentences.english: Men have a natural preference for women with youthfully narrow 1)waists and full 2)hips.
sentences.chinese: 男人很自然會偏好有青春細腰與豐臀的女人。

sentences.english: Liu, GaoGu on narrow pot, sweet grass will be happy to stand in the kitchen kept.
sentences.chinese: 高家，柳細腰將紅薯上鍋，小草快樂地站在廚房守着。

definition: to have bright eyes and white teeth
perfectly round/(fig.) accommodating/considerate/smooth (way of doing things)
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful
to make up/elaborately made up woman
elegant, almond-shaped eyes with the inner canthus pointing down and the outer canthus up, like the eye of a phoenix
